definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
to have more work than one can deal with/to have one's hands full
cannot stand by idly and watch/unable to put up with it any longer/see 看不過去|看不过去[kan4 bu5 guo4 qu5]
so angry it's unbearable/bitter about unbearable grievances
a thing should not be attempted more than three times (idiom)/don't repeat the same mistake again and again/bad things don't happen more than three times
not more than so-so (idiom); mediocre/nothing out of the ordinary
It's all exaggeration, you don't need to take it seriously/a fuss about nothing/nothing to write home about
pinyin: sha1 ren2 bu4 guo4 tou2 dian3 di4

definition: to be unable to breathe easily
unable to defeat/to be no match for sb

sentences.english: I only honoured my promise to your father.
sentences.chinese: 我只不過完成了我對你父親的承諾。

sentences.english: But first, we need to know some terminology.
sentences.chinese: 不過，我們首先需要了解一些術語。

sentences.english: But that is a tale for another decade.
sentences.chinese: 不過，那將是下一個十年的故事。

sentences.english: But he must not espouse the old lady needlessly.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他不能毫無必要地娶那個老女人。

sentences.english: He is only teasing. Don't take it so seriously.
sentences.chinese: 他不過是戲弄而已，別太當回事兒。

sentences.english: But people are always coming late to operas .
sentences.chinese: 不過人們總是很遲纔來看歌劇。

sentences.english: The little chicks had no more than whetted his appetite.
sentences.chinese: 那幾只小雞隻不過引起了他的食慾而已。

sentences.english: He is just a small-time actor.
sentences.chinese: 他不過是個跑龍套的演員。

sentences.english: The newly discovered notes are nothing more than Jack's personal journal.
sentences.chinese: 新發現的筆記只不過是傑克的個人日記。

sentences.english: It's carrion! Who killed that man?
sentences.chinese: 不過是一具腐爛的屍體罷了，誰殺了這個人？

sentences.english: So won't you live your life?
But they use game theory to reward good translations with badges, yes?
sentences.chinese: 不過譯言有運用博弈論，好的翻譯會得證章，對吧？

sentences.english: Still, the brand was enough to energise its early hires.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這一品牌足以激勵公司早期的員工。

sentences.english: That deceit won't pass with me.

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
